overview:
Stephen is a Director of Contango MicroCap Limited and Contango Capital Partners Limited. He has worked in the funds management, investment banking and chartered accounting fields for over 25 years. His roles have included Audit Supervisor, Manager - Corporate Services, Senior Investment Manager, Head of Equities, Chief Investment Officer and Executive Director.

Stephen is a member of both the Financial Services Institute of Australasia and the Institute of Chartered Accountants.

Prior to launching Contango with David Stevens in 1998, Stephen had been Head of Equities from 1990 and the Chief Investment Officer from 1995 at HSBC Asset Management. Previously, Stephen had worked with Coopers & Lybrand in Adelaide and ANZ Capital Markets in Melbourne.
